title: A great, easy to use platform with the best customer service
name: Russ K.
pros: Pros: Mitingu has everything you need to run successful events. The set up and management side of things is extremely straight forward, quick and simple to brand for our clients, yet powerful and adaptable enough for all their demands. One of the parts that we enjoy most though is the great customer service, nothing is too much trouble and always acted on promptly and efficiently.
cons: Cons: It seems a bit of a cliché, but for us and our requirements, there really are no downsides to Mitingu!

title: Simple and brilliant customised event websites and registration process
name: Natalie R.
comments: Comments: We've reduced build time, translation time and costs dramatically since using Mitingu. From our centralised templates and event site themes our Event Managers can build and personalise events and delegate communications, test and deploy in a day. The insight and information that Mitingu gives us feeds our Sales and Marketing CRM and the delegates experience is enhanced because of the personalisation we can give.

title: Simple to use, brand and report on. Everything you need in an event platform.
name: Alexandria M.
comments: Comments: Have been really pleased with Mitingu. I used to run delegate acquisition campaigns for a major worldwide media company - if only we had had Mitingu then! Easy to manage and brand multiple events, extract your data, report on campaign effectiveness -and you don't have to be a digital whizz to use it.
